channel.title: web-comics on Martins Blog
channel.description: Recent content in web-comics on Martins Blog

item.title: Spielmann's Stricknadel
item.description: Die Temperatur der Nadel in deutschen Digitalprojeten ist unabhängig von der Umsetzungsgeschwindigkeit. Egal wie lange gestrickt wird, die Nadel kühlt nicht ab. Selbst bei Projekten, die praktisch stillstehen, bleibt die Nadel stets heiß.

item.title: 404 - C2 Not found
item.description: When you’ve given everything, but C2 just doesn’t respond anymore.

item.title: Pseudo Random Bullshit Generator
item.description: Basic building block of IT and especially InfoSec companies: Pseudo Random Bullsh*t Generators.

item.title: Risk Assessment Planets
item.description: Risk of software vulnerabilities being created, risk of being hit by ransomware, … Seems I found some universal rule here.

item.title: We must be innovative
item.description: Sure thing, we must explore new paths. And just because others have already gone down these paths does not mean that they are not new to us.

item.title: Cyber Security Focus Mismatch
item.description: Next audit already in my calendar, not sure about the next attack though.

item.title: Valuing your tech people 101
item.description: Save your praise for sales people.
